title: Not a single honor capsule after playing around 60 games or more on lvl3 honor?
body: I got honor lvl3 few days after last patch and played a lot since then, am i just unlucky or something else, really would like a chance for Grey Warwick

replies.body: Honor capsules aren't exactly a guaranteed drop, just as key fragments aren't on a constant drop rate. You do have a chance of getting those capsules anytime a key fragment would have dropped, so many sure you're refreshing your client every once and a while to make sure you see the notifications.
